testimonials.name: Lyle Brown
testimonials.text: Cheslyn's extroverted personality is one thats laced with power. His presence allows you to feel comfortable. He is always ready to have a chat and is allows willing to help with whatever he can in his capacity.

testimonials.name: Taahirah Ismail
testimonials.text: Cheslyn is a hard-working individual, and natural-born leader. He has this presence about him that makes you want to listen and follow him. Generally a great guy to have around.

testimonials.name: Ethan Lesar
testimonials.text: I have had the pleasure of working alongside Cheslyn, and I can confidently say that he is an exceptional team member. He has a remarkable ability to listen to others' ideas and perspectives with an open mind.

testimonials.name: Timothy Barry
testimonials.text: Have had the pleasure of working alongside Cheslyn and he is a great personality to be around. He is a very kind person and also very genuine. He works extremely well in a team and also by himself.

testimonials.name: Luke Evertson
testimonials.text: Cheslyn Herman, an enthusiastic and charismatic individual who is truly hardworking and motivated to do the best and bring out the best in others. A pleasure to work and socialise with.

testimonials.name: Caryn-Jane Lodewyk
testimonials.text: One of Cheslyn's strong suits are communicationa and teamwork. I've had the pleasure of working with Cheslyn and what I can say from our interactions is that he is a dedicated and hardworking inndividual.

testimonials.name: Ayesha Galant
testimonials.text: Cheslyn is dedicated and very passionate about his work. Working together makes me motivated to go above and beyond to reach our goals and of course, having fun while doing so.

testimonials.name: Meezaan Davids
testimonials.text: Cheslyn's bright personality and social skills have made him a valuable member of our team. He has a talent for keeping the team together and his work is always tidy and simple. Working with Cheslyn has been a great experience.

experience.duties: Taking inbound calls and making outbound calls to customers within the UK. Listening to customer needs and providing solutions to customer queries. Liasing with team leader and junior operations manager.
Greet customers upon entering store. Assisting with queries and offering excellent customer service. Cleaning the store. Maintain outstanding store condition and visual merchandising standards.

projects.title: Bootstrap Jumbotron Exercise
projects.desc: Practice of how to make a Bootstrap jumbotron, also incorporated some information about myself as well as an image of myself.

projects.title: Bootstrap Portfolio
projects.desc: My first end of module project at Life Choices academy, as well as my first digital portfolio made using Bootstrap.

projects.title: JavaScript Calculator
projects.desc: Built a calculator using JavaScript. It is the first web application that I had built using JavaScript.

projects.title: BMI Calculator
projects.desc: Another JavaScript web application. I had built a BMI calculator using functions and the BMI calculation.

projects.title: Temperature Converter
projects.desc: I was required to do a temperature converter using JavaScript. I had done it in some ways similar to the BMI calculator.

projects.title: JavaScript E-commerce Practice
projects.desc: Learnt how to use template literals to display products on an e-commerce site. This was practice for the JavaScript end of module project.

projects.title: JavaScript E-commerce Site
projects.desc: Built a JavaScript e-commerce web-application for the end of module project. The concept for the store was a costume store that specialises in selling anime, horror and hero costumes.
